TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContractReference extends System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference

summary.span: 表示探索 (Discovery) 文件中對服務描述的參考。

span.span: Represents a reference in a discovery document to a service description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web service 探索牽涉到探索可用的 Web 服務指定的 URL。XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available Web Services given an URL. URL 通常是指探索文件，通常會有 a.disco 副檔名。The URL usually points to a discovery document, which typically has a.disco file name extension. 探索文件中所參考 XML Web 服務的檔案存在相關資訊。Within a discovery document are references to information about the existance of XML Web services. 服務描述、 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述或其他探索文件可以參考這些參考。These references can refer to service descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas or other discovery documents. 此類別代表服務描述的參考。This class represents a reference to a Service Description. 探索文件中的服務描述的參考包含在`contractRef`XML 項目。Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. `contractRef` XML 項目具有兩個屬性：`ref`和`docRef`。The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes: `ref` and `docRef`. `contractRef`項目必須具有 XML 命名空間相符常數，而`ref`並`docRef`屬性會放在和屬性。The `contractRef` element must have an XML namespace matching the constant, whereas the `ref` and `docRef` attributes are placed in the and properties. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/CPP/contractreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/CS/contractreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/VB/contractreference.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 探索文件中的服務描述的參考包含在`contractRef`XML 項目。Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. `contractRef` XML 項目具有下表中所述的兩個屬性。The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes described in the following table. |屬性Attribute|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |refref|服務描述的 URL。The URL for the service description. 屬性表示的值`ref`屬性。The property represents the value of the `ref` attribute.| |docRefdocRef|實作服務描述所指定的 XML Web service 的 URL`ref`屬性。The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description specified by the `ref` attribute. 屬性表示的值`docRef`屬性。The property represents the value of the `docRef` attribute.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性。The following code example sets the property of . [!code-cpp[ContractReference_Reference#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference_Reference/CPP/contractreference_ref.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ContractReference_Reference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference_Reference/CS/contractreference_ref.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ContractReference_Reference#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference_Reference/VB/contractreference_ref.vb#3)]

span.span: XML namespace for service description references in discovery documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 探索文件中的服務描述的參考內含`contractRef`中指定的 XML 項目，也就是 XML 命名空間的一部分常數。Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element, which is a part of the XML namespace specified in the constant. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例的值輸出至主控台常數。The following code example outputs to the console the value of the constant. remarks.format: ## Remarks MIME 類型是否`text/xml`和內容`stream`是服務描述，則內容`stream`新增至並屬性。If the MIME type is `text/xml` and the contents of `stream` is a Service Description, then the contents of `stream` are added to the and properties of .
